GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY PRELOAD SCORE ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT CAN_CAPTURE IGNORES_SELECT_ALL PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY SKIRMISH_AI_DONT_GARRISON ENGINEER CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") end if Prev == "STATE_Selected" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_attentionToBored") end if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Cover" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_CoverToCoverAttention") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Cover_Selected" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_CoverAttentionToCover") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_boredToAttention") end;
